name: set area
VeggiTent-LiveData
func:
const entity = {
    entity_id: null,
    state: null,
    attributes: null
}

entity.entity_id = msg.payload.event.new_state.entity_id
entity.state = msg.payload.event.new_state.state
entity.attributes = msg.payload.event.new_state.attributes

msg.payload = entity
msg.topic = "liveData"
return msg;
